posts.post_content:
My deck runs 4 Cloudpost, 4 [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva), and a [Mycosynth Lattice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycosynth Lattice) Then, instead of 64 colorless mana, I have 64 (Red, White, Blue, Black, Green in any combo) land! So you want [Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker) out turn 4 with 8 spare mana of any color in reserve for creatures, well you got it.   
So, ideally it would go like so:  
Turn 1: Cloudpost  
Turn 2: [Amulet of Vigor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amulet of Vigor ) , then Cloudpost or [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva), tap for 2 [Everflowing Chalice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Everflowing Chalice )  kicked 1 time  
Turn 3: Cloudpost or [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva), [Mycosynth Lattice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycosynth Lattice )   
Turn 4: Cloudpost or [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva), [Tooth and Nail](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tooth and Nail) for 9 searching for [Emrakul, the Aeons Torn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emrakul, the Aeons Torn) and [Blightsteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightsteel Colossus), and you still have enough for a planeswalker such as [Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker), or just burn with something like [Comet Sto](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Comet Sto)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

So, ideally it would go like so:

Turn 4: Cloudpost or Vesuva, Tooth and Nail for 9 searching for Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Blightsteel Colossus, and you still have enough for a planeswalker such as Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker, or just burn with something like Comet Sto... (see all)

Posted By: DaJoshMaster (1/16/2013 2:59:13 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I don't think this card is as over powered as people think, it comes into play tapped so you can't do anything with it turn one, and on turn two you only have two mana to spend any ways, even if you are lucky enough to get [Amulet of Vigor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amulet of Vigor) in your opening hand. compared to other mana ramp it actually lacks. and are you really going to run 4 amulet of vigor? and even then you might not get it, so what do you do run search cards? well now even more cards in you deck don't do anything. also this is assuming you get all of your cloudposts and vesuvas on que, which is unlikely and there is only a small number of cards you can use to search for them, and only one of them isn't green. so what are you going to do? run more search cards? run mana fixing to play green spells? or you could just go mono green and play all your eldrazi just as quick but more reliably.
posts.html:
